faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our pet sitting services
faq.contactDesc: We're here to help! Reach out to our support team.

howItWorks.a: Pet Sitter connects pet owners with trusted, verified pet sitters in their area. Simply browse available sitters, read reviews, and book the perfect match for your pet's needs.

cost.a: Prices vary depending on the service type and sitter. Most services range from 18-80 RON per hour. You can filter by price range to find options that fit your budget.

safety.a: Yes! All pet sitters on our platform undergo background checks and verification. We ensure they have experience and genuine love for animals.

booking.q: How do I book a pet sitter?
booking.a: Browse available sitters, select one that matches your needs, and click 'Book Now'. You'll be able to communicate directly with the sitter to arrange details.

cancellation.a: You can cancel up to 24 hours before the scheduled service for a full refund. Cancellations within 24 hours may incur a fee.

emergency.a: All sitters have access to 24/7 support. In case of emergency, they can contact our team immediately and will follow your pet's emergency care instructions.

becomeSitter.q: How do I become a pet sitter?
becomeSitter.a: Click 'Create Ad' to set up your sitter profile. You'll need to provide information about your experience, services offered, and availability. After verification, you can start accepting bookings.

earnings.q: How much can I earn as a sitter?
earnings.a: Earnings depend on your services, rates, and availability. Most sitters earn between 500-3000 RON per month. You set your own rates and schedule.

payment.a: Payments are processed securely through our platform. Funds are transferred to your account within 2-3 business days after service completion.

insurance.q: Am I insured as a sitter?
insurance.a: Yes, all bookings made through Pet Sitter include liability insurance coverage for both sitters and pet owners during the service period.

multiPets.q: Can I care for multiple pets?
multiPets.a: Absolutely! Many sitters offer discounts for multiple pets from the same family. You can specify this in your service description.

reviews.a: After each service, both pet owners and sitters can leave reviews. Reviews help build trust and improve the quality of our community.
